INIT_SCREEN.BROWSER_INCOMPATIBLE: Your browser is not currently supported. Supported browsers include Chrome, Safari, Opera and most browsers based on Chromium
INIT_SCREEN.MESSAGE: Select a folder with existing collections, or a new empty folder
BUTTON.SET_SEPARATE: Separate an image from a set
LABEL.NAME: Name
PLACEHOLDER.NAME: Input name...
NOTIFICATION.MESSAGE.COLLECTION_LOAD_ERR: Something went wrong while loading the collection
NOTIFICATION.MESSAGE.IMAGE_EDIT_ERROR: Image has not been modified, something went wrong
NOTIFICATION.MESSAGE.IMAGE_CREATE_ERROR: Image was not created, something went wrong
NOTIFICATION.MESSAGE.COLLECTION_ALREADY_: A collection with the same name already exists
PROMPT.COLL_CORR_CONVERT_IMAGES: This collection will become corrupted. Convert images?
PROMPT.COLL_NORMAL_CONVERT_IMAGES: This collection will become normal. Convert images?
TOOLTIP.CORRUPTED:
Make images in the collection corrupted.

Extra data will be inserted into each image, making it impossible to view them in any other way.

This option affects performance.
This is not encryption, a knowledgeable person will be able to recover these images.
TOOLTIP.SEPARATE_IMAGE: The image will be separated from the set and become a standalone image
TOOLTIP.SAVE_IMAGE_CHANGES: All changes in the current image will be saved
